participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, she enjoys engaging in conversations about family and everyday life.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a suburban neighborhood, where family values were emphasized. She often talks about her experiences with children and parenting.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and humorous, he likes to share anecdotes that lighten the mood while discussing serious topics.
participant_2.background: Michael comes from a large family and often reflects on his childhood experiences with siblings and cousins, which shapes his views on parenting.
